lexUnit.name: plod.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: walk doggedly and slowly with heavy steps.

sentence.text: The old dog plodded alongside while the younger one careered wildly up and down without managing to distract the sheep who were eager to get home and be relieved of their milk .
